Replace.Text: [NEWLINE]This city can't hold more than {1_Num} aircraft.
Your {@1_UnitName} is receiving [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Counter-Fire[ENDCOLOR] from an enemy {@2_EnUName}!
Your {@1_UnitName} was able to use [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Counter-Fire[ENDCOLOR] against an enemy {@2_EnUName}!
Your {@1_UnitName} was able to provide [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Preparation Fire[ENDCOLOR] for your {@2_EnUName} attack!
An enemy {@1_UnitName} was able to provide [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Preparation Fire[ENDCOLOR] for his {@2_EnUName} attack!
An enemy {@1_UnitName} was able to provide [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Counter-Preparation Fire[ENDCOLOR] against your {@2_EnUName} attack!
Your {@1_UnitName} was able to provide [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Counter-Preparation Fire[ENDCOLOR] against an enemy {@2_EnUName} attack!
